basics.name: Eva Asiskovich
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student studying for a BBA in Finance, Accounting, and Management Information Systems along with a minor in Economics at the University of Hawaii Shidler College of Business. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

education.area: Finance, Accounting, and Management Information Systems (expected Spring, 2022)

education.institution: Hawaii Tokai International College, Kapolei, HI
education.area: Associates of Arts in Liberal Arts)

work.summary: World-wide operations providing investment banking and advisory services. In addition to offering equities, options, futures, commodity derivatives, ETFs, and fixed income securities trading services.
highlights: Provide market summary at the end of US market close for colleagues and clientele
Examine global corporate news in addition to earnings release and compare market expectations
Collect macroeconomic data and monitor Federal Open Market Committee actions

awards.title: Global Citizen Scholarships
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to students with high GPAs and have completed at least the minimum requirement of community service hours.
